OrgName: PureWorks, Inc. dba UL Workplace Health and Safety
activities: UL uses personal information regarding its clients’ personnel to (1) provide occupational health management and training resources, including management of clients’ data, including employee information, as it relates to occupational health management, training and workplace education programs; (2) host clients’ employee information as it relates to training and workplace education programs; and (3) operate, develop and improve UL’s services and products.
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)Education & Training - (EDS)Information Services - (INF)Health Care Services - (HCS)
recoursemech: UL will cooperate with the Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services (“JAMS”) in accordance with the expedited rules of JAMS.
